mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.title, u.name AS author, p.view_count, p.created_at, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_likes pl WHERE pl.post_id = p.post_id) AS likes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_comments pc WHERE pc.post_id = p.post_id) AS comments FROM post p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_no ORDER BY p.post_id DESC

SELECT p.post_id, p.user_id, p.title, p.content, u.name AS author, p.view_count, p.created_at, p.image_path, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_likes pl WHERE pl.post_id = p.post_id) AS likes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_comments pc WHERE pc.post_id = p.post_id) AS comments FROM post p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_no WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}
